EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunities with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Would you like to be a part of a team of NCS graduates who form a hospitality team that supports an important event that increases awareness around social mixing? The event, which partly run by The Challenge, is aimed at politicians, policy makers, businesses and charities. This event will explore the opportunities people have to mix across lines of difference and consider the benefits of increased social contact between different groups of people.
On the day you would; o Arrive at around 4.15pm o Help with some of the set up of the room o Welcome guests on arrival and check them off on the register o Oversee the refreshments to ensure they stay well stocked o Participate in the event
Date: Thursday 20th November Location: The Fusion Centre, South and City College B5 5SU
If you would like to support this high profile event and learn more about this important agenda then email afua.kudom@the-challenge.org by 9am Thursday 20th November.
